name: Các hoạt động liên quan đến du lịch (Travel Activities)

words.vietnamese: Đi du lịch, sự đi lại
words.example: I love to travel to new countries and experience different cultures.
We took a short trip to the mountains last weekend.
The journey across the continent was long but rewarding.
They are planning a summer vacation to the beach.
We will visit our relatives during the holidays.
Let's explore the ancient ruins tomorrow.
We spent the whole day sightseeing in Paris.
You should book your flight tickets in advance.
We need to check in at the hotel by 3 PM and check out by noon.
Don't forget to pack your passport for the international trip.
